channel.title: Artifactory on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Artifactory on DevOps Engineer

item.title: Upload artifacts failed to Artifactory from AIX
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to resolve an SSL certificate verification issue on AIX when uploading artifacts to Artifactory via Jenkins, including updating Java’s cacerts file.

item.title: How to download the entire folder artifacts when Artifactory "Download Folder functionality is disabled"?
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article explains how to download the entire folder artifacts from JFrog Artifactory when the “Download Folder functionality is disabled”. It provides a workaround using Artifactory REST APIs to retrieve and download artifacts programmatically.
